channel.title: Gauntlet Video Roundup Post - June 11, 2021
channel.description:
Greetings, all! [This week's Gauntlet Calendar video roundup post](https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/blog/gauntlet-video-roundup-june-11-2021) is now up on The Gauntlet Blog! This week we've got sessions of these great games:
* _A Long Night in the Mech Bay_ * _Against the Dark Conspiracy_ * _Bounty of the Week 2nd ed_ * _Dune: Adventures in the Imperium_ * _Good Society_ * _Hearts of Wulin_ * _Ironsworn_ * _Monster of the Week_ * _Once More Into the Void_ * _Paragon System_ * _Rebel Crown_ * _Sorcerer_ * _Storm Furies_ * _The Between_ * _Trophy Gold_
Thanks go out to all this week's facilitators and players. If you want to join in the fun, head over to the [Gauntlet Calendar category](https://forums.gauntlet-rpg.com/c/gauntlet-calendar) on the Forums to see the latest game announcements, and sign up on the [Gauntlet Calendar](https://gauntletcalendar.com/events) to play!

item.title: Gauntlet Video Roundup Post - June 11, 2021
item.dc:creator: @flatvurm
item.description:
@flatvurm wrote:

Greetings, all! This week’s Gauntlet Calendar video roundup post is now up on The Gauntlet Blog! This week we’ve got sessions of these great games:

  • A Long Night in the Mech Bay
  • Against the Dark Conspiracy
  • Bounty of the Week 2nd ed
  • Dune: Adventures in the Imperium
  • Good Society
  • Hearts of Wulin
  • Ironsworn
  • Monster of the Week
  • Once More Into the Void
  • Paragon System
  • Rebel Crown
  • Sorcerer
  • Storm Furies
  • The Between
  • Trophy Gold

Thanks go out to all this week’s facilitators and players. If you want to join in the fun, head over to the Gauntlet Calendar category on the Forums to see the latest game announcements, and sign up on the Gauntlet Calendar to play!
